name: Skomia
description:
Bondar, an eccentric mechanic, with his mates Lucy, K3k0 and Redford lives in a prison-planet, with all of the space rabble.

On any given day, one of those that the sun raises in the middle of the shiniest junk and debris you can imagine, they decide to escape and make his way to Astara, the most advanced and impolluted city of the galaxy. Their motivations? EASY! There are things in the heart that common sense cannot understand… like the imperious need to buy pine air fresheners. 

In his frantic escape of Skomia, they will be constantly attacked by the respectable fleet of the Intergalactic Federation, which major obsession is keep order and cleanliness in every corner of the space.

Developed by: Twisted Hammer
